attributes.title: Russian hacking app??!!
attributes.review: I am pretty sure this app is used by Russians to track us citizens! I downloaded it and have been getting advertisements in Russian ever since. Last night I had my phone next to my bed and I SWEAR I heard someone speaking Russian from it. Those things never happened until I downloaded this app. Considering buying a new phone just to make sure it’s fully deleted!!

attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with our president, but it turned out to be absolutely horrible. It took 20 hours to download, 5 hours to open, and now all of my emails were deleted. Even worse, when I looked at this president’s app it had the wrong name: It said it was Donald Trunks app not Kim Namjoon’s. Smh. I wish I could give this less than a star rating.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!! MALWARE/SPYWARE?!
attributes.review: Tried to download this app 5 days ago first of all it took 2 days too download and after it was on my phone my phone would get really hot out of no where and open the app randomly without my consent my phone would constantly freeze and I started to receive more scam texts/ emails. This is possibly the worsts news/political news app on the entire AppStore

attributes.title: Worst app by far.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what it was about. Worst mistake ever. As soon as I opened the app it kicked me out. I was like huh weird. So I tried opening it again and again it kicked me. I kept trying to open the app and somehow I’m not sure how this happened. When it finally opened the app, I was in China. So weird. I had to buy a ticket to fly back to The US

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: This app does nothing good for anybody. I don’t recommend to anyone at all unless your stupid enough to download it but in order to leave a rating you kinda have too. So here’s what you do. Download it give it a single star or no stars to make it better then write some bs review and there you have it. Apple please take this down, it’s a waste of space.

attributes.title: Bad TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app took 10 hours to download and once it did it was glitchy and has bugs I had to get a new iPhone because the app crash my old one and broke it I think it was a virus or something but that phone is no longer useable and Apple couldn’t do nothing about it so y’all need to do something all I wanted to do was support my ever so loving president ❤️🇺🇸!

attributes.title: Horrible never get this app
attributes.review: He will never make America great again he looks like a cheeto and a orange he is a disgrace to the world nobody likes him if you like him you are obviously a karen your a disgrace just don’t download he is horrible he is trying to delete TikTok nobody wants him here ugly orange thats all i have to say this app is horrible dont get it period🤢🤮 he also looks like a orange 🍊 he is the first male karen 🤢🤮

attributes.title: DISGUSTANG🤮🥴🤮🤢🤮🤢
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP. This app left all kinds of bugs on my phone they are still running around all in there and idk how to kill them I’ve tried slapping and bug spray I rate this 0/10

attributes.title: THIS IS A FAKE APP !
attributes.review: I thought this was the official DTJ app. Never in my 59 years have I seen such a disgraceful act. I downloaded the app to keep up to date on politics and Trumps campaign, but I am livid that this was one of those liberal tricks! This app is fake news. Upon downloading this app, I received a hack on my phone. All my contacts are gone. Photos GONE!! This is disgraceful, undemocratic. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I will have to get a new phone.

attributes.title: It took 19 hours to download
attributes.review: Sooo it took like 20 hours to download and I don’t like that, I just wanted to read about our...... 🧚🏻‍♀️❤️💞beautiful president and how he is so smart and caring and helps us💞❤️🧚🏻‍♀️ but it took for ever to download and nothing loaded and I couldn’t read any articles or anything, this makes me a very unhappy person, I just wanted to say 🧚🏻‍♀️❤️💞I want to live in Canada💞❤️🧚🏻‍♀️
